Package dataFrame

Interface DataFrameInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
DataFrameObserver
All Known Implementing Classes:

Interface fot the DataFrame

    • query

      DataFrame query(String label, int option, String compare)
      Method query return all elements where a label value fulfills a certain condition.
      Parameters:
      label - column
      option - how to search
      compare - what are we searching
      Returns:
      the elements in the defined condition
